title: Turkey's Erdogan declares 10 ambassadors 'persona non grata,' escalating tensions with Western allies
content:
1. Turkey's Erdogan declares 10 ambassadors 'persona non grata,' escalating tensions with Western allies  The Washington Post
  2. Turkey to expel U.S. envoy and nine others, Erdogan says  Reuters
  3. Erdogan orders removal of 10 ambassadors, including US envoy  Yahoo News
  4. Turkish Opposition Begins Joining Ranks Against Erdogan  The New York Times
  5. Erdoğan orders foreign minister to expel ambassadors from 10 Western countries | TheHill  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Turkey's Erdogan declares 10 ambassadors 'persona non grata,' escalating tensions with Western allies  The Washington Post

Erdogan orders removal of 10 ambassadors, including US envoy  Yahoo News

localize.title: トルコのエルドアン大統領、10人の大使を「ペルソナ・ノン・グラータ（好ましからざる人物）」とし、同盟国である欧米諸国との緊張を激化させる
